description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国文化部副部长、中国艺术研究院院长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Minister of Culture and President of the Chinese National Academy of Arts.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省下辖的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山东省的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university in Shandong province, China.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会培养高、中级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部的最高学府。
description.en: The higher education institution that specifically trains officials for the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国文化部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国文化部
en: Ministry of Culture of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院负责文化与艺术事务的组成部门，2018年并入新组建的中华人民共和国文化和旅游部。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for cultural and artistic affairs, which was merged into the new Ministry of Culture and Tourism in 2018.
The publisher of China Culture Daily.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家级的艺术科研、创作和教育机构。
description.en: A national-level institution for artistic research, creation, and education in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国非物质文化遗产保护中心

zh-cn: 中国非物质文化遗产保护中心
en: China Intangible Cultural Heritage Protection Center

description.zh-cn: 负责中国非物质文化遗产保护工作的国家级机构。
description.en: The national-level institution responsible for the protection of intangible cultural heritage in China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织。
description.en: The national-level organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会文史和学习委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会文史和学习委员会
en: Committee for Cultural, Historical and Study Affairs of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会下设的十个专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the ten special committees under the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 由中国各民族戏剧家自愿组成的全国性、专业性、非营利性的社会组织。
description.en: A national, professional, non-profit social organization voluntarily formed by theater artists of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 王文章毕业于山东大学中文系。
description.en: Wang Wenzhang graduated from the Chinese Department of Shandong University.

degree.zh-cn: 经济管理专业在职研究生

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国文化部

position.zh-cn: 艺术局研究室副主任、戏剧处处长、艺术管理处处长、艺术司司长
position.en: Deputy Director of the Research Office, Director of the Theatre Division, Director of the Arts Management Division of the Arts Bureau, and Director of the Department of Arts

position.zh-cn: 副社长兼副总编辑、社长兼总编辑
position.en: Deputy President and Deputy Editor-in-Chief, President and Editor-in-Chief

position.zh-cn: 常务副院长兼党委副书记、院长、党委书记
position.en: Executive Vice President and Deputy Party Secretary, President, Party Secretary

description.zh-cn: 代表文化艺术界，分入第二十八组。
description.en: Representing the cultural and art circles, assigned to the 28th group.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会文史和学习委员会

description.en: According to page category information, Wang Wenzhang is a member of the China Theatre Association.
